
This version of MKBackup has be tested with version of ghettoVCB.sh released on 27 jul 2010.
This version is available here : http://www.magikmon.com/download/mkbackup/ghettoVCB-20100727.tar.gz

The latest version of ghettoVCB.sh can be found here http://communities.vmware.com/docs/DOC-8760
This version, if new, could be incompatible with MKBackup. Use it with care.
